ai-patthana8.52:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in SN 4.)
ai-patthana8.52:1.1_0: No corruptions are the cause of corruption.
ai-patthana8.52:2.1_0: Being committed to the confinement, but doesn’t arise to for the reason.
ai-patthana8.52:3.1_0: There is no corruption of corruptions, cutting off, or grounded by yokes, and not the priority force.
ai-patthana8.52:4.1_0: (These five discourses should be expanded in line with the previous set.)
